text: Beaumont Saint-Cyr is a commune in the department of Vienne, western France. The municipality was established on 1 January 2017 by merger of the former communes of Beaumont (the seat) and Saint-Cyr.Arrêté préfectoral 16 June 2016 == See also == *Communes of the Vienne department == References == Category:Communes of Vienne
title: Beaumont Saint-Cyr
